::Perndabot/Slayer::

Perndabot recieves Darkfate's message, replying affirmitively and 
setting the defences not to fire on the Predacons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer picks up comm traffic heading for the Alliance base, swearing. 
Several shots nearly hit him, but he manages to avoid them. Suddenly, 
Slayer angles upward, deciding not to go the Alliance base. It was 
too much a risk if that comm traffic was a message.

Slayer flipps over in the air, firing two signature-seeking missiles 
at Attilla and flying to the side.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Attilla/Shivah/Bat probes/Darkfate::
> 
> Darkfate using his computer and bat probes, followed the bots. He 
> used his comm link and comunicates with Perndabot (OOc: sorry for 
the 
> spelling). "Darkfate to Perndabot" said the male "Two of my troops 
> are following a bot who attack our base, they're close of 
Alliance's 
> base, I'll send the signature of my troops in order to you don't 
> shoot them"
> 
> he send the signatures of Shivah and Attilla, while he send a 
secret 
> menssage to them.
> 
> Attilla and Shivah guessed Slayer's play and they (with the probes)
> spread in several direcctions while them increased the speed. They 
> started to shot against Slayer again
